contact.description:
If you want to work with me, send a message through the form
or contact me directly by email.
contact.pageLead: Currently available for freelance projects and new challenges.
contact.pageDetails: With a solid track record in full-stack development of various applications, I offer the technical expertise necessary to build fast, reliable, and high-performance software, aligned with industry standards.
contact.form.title: Send a message
contact.form.notice: I reply by email only (no phone calls).
contact.form.success: Thanks! Your message has been sent.
contact.form.errors.required: Please fill in all required fields.
contact.form.errors.email: Please enter a valid email address.
contact.form.errors.generic: Something went wrong while sending. Please try again.
contact.form.errors.missingKey: Email service not configured. Please try again later.
contact.form.errors.turnstileMissing: Security challenge not configured. Please try again later.
